Html:
Hi!

Congratulations to the team for the February Release of the WPF Toolkit! Is there a list of bugs which are fixed in this release?

Especially this bug:
http://wpf.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=9699

Thanks!

Jus

Hey Jus,

 

After fixing some bugs in related areas we were not able to reproduce this bug.  If you run into this in the current version of the toolkit can you please let us know, and if possible attach a small application that demonstrates the problem?

 

Thanks as always for sending your feedback!

Alexis

Alexis,

I can not reproduce the error with the new version. Great work! Thanks!

Jus
